main event: A UFO was reported descending slowly and increasing in brightness at Keesler AFB on 21 Sep 1963.
interesting points: The object was initially circular or spherical in shape and very bright,The object remained stationary for about 15 seconds before moving downward,The object increased in brightness as it moved in a semi-elliptic trajectory toward the southwest,The object faded out and disappeared after a short observation period,It was reported by military personnel on a routine patrol.
witness description: Capt Joseph H. Lyie and A2C John B. Seburn - USAF, Central Command Security Squad, 3905th Maintenance Squadron
